trans-unit.source: Configuring EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT on BizTalk Services Portal
trans-unit.target: Configuring EDI, AS2, and EDIFACT on BizTalk Services Portal

trans-unit.source: Lists an overview of the steps to configure Business to Business using the <token>tpm_full</token>.
trans-unit.target: Lists an overview of the steps to configure Business to Business using the <token>tpm_full</token>.

trans-unit.source: The <token>tpm_full</token> used by your <token>af_integration</token> applications is completely web-based.
trans-unit.target: The <token>tpm_full</token> used by your <token>af_integration</token> applications is completely web-based.

trans-unit.source: Log into the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=213885</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>provision a BizTalk Service</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/biztalk-provision-services/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: Log into the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Management Portal</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=213885</linkUri></externalLink> and <externalLink><linkText>provision a BizTalk Service</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/biztalk-provision-services/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: When the BizTalk Service is provisioned, opening the <token>tpm_portal</token> automatically registers you or your company as the service provider; which includes entering your BizTalk Service name, the Access Control Service (ACS) Issuer Name, and the ACS Issuer Key.
trans-unit.target: When the BizTalk Service is provisioned, opening the <token>tpm_portal</token> automatically registers you or your company as the service provider; which includes entering your BizTalk Service name, the Access Control Service (ACS) Issuer Name, and the ACS Issuer Key.

trans-unit.source: Create an EDIFACT, X12, or AS2 agreement between the partners.
trans-unit.target: Create an EDIFACT, X12, or AS2 agreement between the partners.

trans-unit.source: Add the schemas to the agreement.
trans-unit.target: Add the schemas to the agreement.

trans-unit.source: These steps are described in the following links.
trans-unit.target: These steps are described in the following links.

trans-unit.source: This section details how to set up and configure a trading partner relationship.
trans-unit.target: This section details how to set up and configure a trading partner relationship.
